overview: Several indigenous peoples are mobilizing in Bras√≠lia, Roraima and Amazonas in the face of an important judgment at the Federal Supreme Court (STF). In partnership with indigenous communicators from the Indigenous Council of Roraima (CIR) and the Collective of Mura Communicators, the film presents the Fight for Land in the three territories, bringing the different traditions and strategies that build this strong process of collective resistance.
title: Luta Pela Terra
